isCompatibleHorizontalAxis

public boolean isCompatibleHorizontalAxis(Axis axis)
Returns true if the specified axis is compatible with the plot with regard to operating as the horizontal axis.

This plot requires the horizontal axis to be a subclass of HorizontalNumberAxis or HorizontalDateAxis.

Overrides:
isCompatibleHorizontalAxis in class Plot
Parameters:
axis - The axis.

This plot requires the vertical axis to be a subclass of VerticalNumberAxis.
